title: Radio Replay: The Mind of the Village
description: A culture of racism can infect us all. On this week's Radio Replay, we discuss the implicit biases we carry that have been forged by the society around us.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: A culture of racism can infect us all. On this week's Radio Replay, we discuss the implicit biases we carry that have been forged by the society around us.
